title: Automobilista
notes: The game runs well, but Force Feedback in wheels (logitech g27) don't work

It takes a very long time to load. Graphics works fine, except for minor HUD artifacts. Sound works perfect. You can only play time trial or single race offline, accessing multiplayer crashes the game. Performance is clearly inferior compared to native.
